channel.title: Gogs on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Gogs on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Gogs, a self-hosted Git server
item.description:
Gogs is a self-hosted Git server, an alternative to using Github as a for-pay hosted service or Gitlab as another self-hosted system. It's written in the Go language, and is said to be sparing of system resources.
I'm building it using Docker on a Raspberry Pi 2, thanks to the folks at Hypriot; the writeup is Run your own GitHub-like service with the help of Docker, and the file on Dockerhub is at hypriot/rpi-gogs-raspbian.
